channel.title: Transaction does not get confirmed
channel.description:
I made a transaction from my wallet to latoken ... it is pending but i am waiting for 2 days now:
Status: 1406 confirmations, broadcast through 6 nodes Date: 25.05.2020 09:40 Debit: -0.0000559 BAY To: BEJAbiJcju5KL7VxddbuuBM39RgyjF63qq Debit: -12,650.00 BAY Transaction fee: -0.05 BAY Net amount: -12,650.0500559 BAY Transaction ID: f0b4d48033bbd95f0e21abf2478dc118fb49068d6e187e9bd5283ccd6323abd2
How many confirmations do i need?
